item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 24th September
item.description:
Give and take 28 day plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level different 6000x1200x30mm please remove raised blocks due to tree roots damage an replace with tarmac patch stats required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet
